site.name: ARDA Analytics
site.description: A lightweight, privacy-focused analytics plugin that gives you the insights you need without the complexity you don't.
site.author: ARDA Team

home.title: ARDA Analytics - Lightweight Privacy-Focused Analytics
home.description: Deploy analytics in minutes with our lightweight, privacy-focused plugin. GDPR compliant, developer-friendly, and less than 5KB.

demo.title: Interactive Demo - ARDA Analytics
demo.description: Try ARDA Analytics in action. See real-time event tracking, explore the API, and test our interactive playground.

docs.title: Documentation - ARDA Analytics
docs.description: Complete documentation, API reference, and integration guides for ARDA Analytics. Get started in minutes.

tools.title: Developer Tools - ARDA Analytics
tools.description: Free online tools for developers and marketers. QR code generator, URL builder, and more productivity tools.

tracking-url-builder.title: Tracking URL Builder - Free UTM Parameter Tool
tracking-url-builder.description: Build custom tracking URLs with UTM parameters for marketing campaigns. Free tool with QR code generation.

qr-code-generator.title: QR Code Generator - Free Customizable QR Codes
qr-code-generator.description: Generate custom QR codes with multiple formats, colors, and sizes. Free tool with instant download.
